footer.about_totem: Totem is an indie game development collective that unites creators and players around a universe of interconnected game experiences. Totem Web Explorer is developed and maintained by IT-Dimension with support and supervising from Totem Foundation. Totem Web Explorer is a third-party software, it is recommended for usage by Totem but is not a part of Totem's core infrastructure.

home.home_widget_title: Try on your Item for any game!
home.home_widget_description: Choose the game name in the widget & see how item appearance will change!
home.preview_game: Preview of game card is right here, so You can see how it looks
home.totem_is_joining_as: Totem is joining as a category to GameJam+, the largest game development marathon and acceleration process in the world
home.main_description: Browse, create and use your unique items, avatars or gems that will be with you across your journey through your favorite game worlds!

core.we_are_giving_away: We are giving away a small amount of tokens which will allow you to buy several Totem assets

popups.continue_session_login_again: If you want to continue the session, please login again
popups.successfully_claimed_the_tokens: You have successfully claimed the tokens. You can now generate your brand new Totem Asset!

description.default_descriptions_game: Struggling punk band, Dead Pets, are still looking for their breakthrough after almost 10 years. Gordy has big plans for the group, but when you turn 30, life starts to get in the way. Dead Pets Unleashed is a narrative, slice of life and management-lite game; get ready to unleash your inner demon! We’ve been through hell and back to get here. Playing together for 10 years despite our differences, I know we have what it takes. Dead Pets is a slice of life, management-lite, narrative game about music and friendship. Playing as Gordy, you’ll go to band practice, manage Gordy’s finances and wellbeing, as well find time to earn enough money to cover rent. From the creators of Welcome to Elk, dive into the demon world of New Void City, and give your childhood dreams one last chance. It’s time to dream big, grow up and rock out! Content Warning: Dead Pets Unleashed will contain a major storyline relating to sexual harassment. We are working with a consultant with this to ensure the storyline is handled in a sensitive way, and there will be tools implemented for the player to ensure their comfort and safety while playing.
